org.apache.gora.mongodb.query

Class MongoDBQuery<K,T extends PersistentBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gora.query.impl.QueryBase<K,T>
      • org.apache.gora.mongodb.query.MongoDBQuery<K,T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Query<K,T>, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class MongoDBQuery<K,T extends PersistentBase>
extends QueryBase<K,T>
    MongoDB specific implementation of the Query interface.
    Author:
    Fabien Poulard

    • Method Detail

      • toDBQuery

        public static com.mongodb.DBObject toDBQuery(Query<?,?> query)
        Compute the query itself. Only make use of the keys for querying.
        Returns:
        a DBObject corresponding to the query

      • toProjection

        public static com.mongodb.DBObject toProjection(String[] fields,
                                MongoMapping mapping)
        Compute the projection of the query, that is the fields that will be retrieved from the database.
        Returns:
        a DBObject corresponding to the list of field to be retrieved with the associated boolean
